items.title: Understanding Theory of Demand - Demand Curve
items.headline: Demand Curve, Law of Demand and Demand Function
objectives_summary: Demand Theory is a theory relating to the relationship between consumer demand for goods and services and their prices. Demand theory forms the basis for the demand curve, which relates consumer desire to the number of goods available. The course consists of all the basic definitions, concepts, schedules and graphical diagrams about demand and demand theory.
